Events.RelatedDescription: Opened pull request "Implement package features on package instead of shared base" (#1435) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: This will allow to reduce dependencies for each package type for AOT scenarios

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "use dotnet foundation signing process" (#1431) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Merged pull request "Convert OpenXmlElementList to be a struct" (#1429) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Opened pull request "update GitVersion.yml" (#1434) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: With this configuration if a prerelease release is created from a branch named `release/<release num>`, then the release will be named `<some release num>-beta<a number>` where "some release num" is the value of `next-version` in GitVersion.yml and "a number" is the number of commits since the version source.

Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "OpenXmlPowerTools\PresentationBuilder.cs: error CS0619: 'OpenXmlPackage.Package' is obsolete" (#1432) at dotnet/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
Hi @tomjebo @mikeebowen 
First point :
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/38904948/236021001-f1c1a584-971f-427c-aece-00e9bf1b789f.png)
could you please help me to update the above function that should work for "Modern" comments?

Second point :
Initially I updated DocumentFormat.OpenXml version to 2.15.0 but don't see commentParts then updated to 2.20.0 and commentParts is there but got the following error =>
**OpenXmlPowerTools\PresentationBuilder.cs: error CS0619: 'OpenXmlPackage.Package' is obsolete: 'This property will be removed in a future version as an implementation detail'**
Could you please tell how can we fix this error?

_Originally posted by @garg716 in https://github.com/dotnet/Open-XML-SDK/issues/1133#issuecomment-1533163265_
